\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=1]
\node[](0)at(0,0.0)
{\scalebox{1}{\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=1]\begin{scope}

\coordinate(int_0)at(0,0.0);
\coordinate(int_1)at(-0.5,0.5);
\coordinate(int_2)at(0.5,0.5);
\coordinate(int_3)at(0,1.0);
\draw[color=gray](int_0)--(int_1);
\draw[color=gray](int_0)--(int_2);
\draw[color=gray](int_1)--(int_3);
\draw[color=gray](int_2)--(int_3);
\fill[color=gray](int_0)circle(2pt);
\fill[color=gray](int_1)circle(2pt);
\fill[color=gray](int_2)circle(2pt);
\fill[color=gray](int_3)circle(2pt);

\end{scope}\end{tikzpicture}}};
